Pre-Game Insights: The Gabon national team has a favorable record against Lesotho, with 3 wins and 1 draw in previous encounters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: In 2014, Gabon won 4-2 against Lesotho in Libreville at the China-Gabon Friendship Stadium.
In 2008, Gabon won 0-3 against Lesotho at home with goals from Écuélé-Manga, Roguy Méyé, and Mbanangoye Zita.
The upcoming matches are scheduled for October 11 and 15, 2024.
